title: E-commerce Website
description: A fully functional e-commerce website built with React and Redux. Features include product listings, cart, checkout, and payment processing using Stripe API.

title: Blog Website
description: A simple blog website built with Node.js and Express. Features include CRUD operations for blog posts, comments, and user authentication using Passport.js.

title: Mobile App
description: A mobile app built with React Native. Features include user authentication, push notifications, and geolocation tracking using Firebase and Google Maps API.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A data visualization dashboard built with D3.js and React. Features include interactive charts and graphs for visualizing data from a variety of sources.
